App_name: What is your mission for this year?
Result: to focus on real friends and remove the fake ones
to use your tenacious spirit to support your friends.
to help those less fortunate than yourself
to follow your dreams and ignore negative people and influences.
to be the change you want to see in the world.
to spread kindness ,ignore hate and smile everyday.
to trust your instincts and fight for justice.
to find your true love no matter how far away.
Result_share: It sure looks like you'll be approaching 2018 with a new sense of purpose Breana. 2017 was a crazy year, one filled with many highs and some hard lows. You now understand what really matters and will use your unbreakable spirit to complete your goals. Nice!
